name: Square Travel / The Guidebook
description:
Square Travel / The Guidebook is a digital toy inspired by the concrete poetry of Erica Baum and Dadaist cut-up generative techniques. 

Use the arrow keys (or tap the screen) to move between pieces.
Hit the Space Bar (or tap outside of the square) to generate an entirely new board.
When you have explored enough, hit Enter (or double-tap outside the square).

This toy is part of a larger look at interactive and digital poetry. I am eager to hear any comments or feedback. Let me know what you think, either here or over on Twitter. 

Read the text in static form here.
